actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the Postal Service from requiring the delivery of mail to certain residences through the use of cluster mailboxes or curbside mailboxes unless local government involved approves the use of such mailboxes.

summary.text: Prohibits the Postal Service from requiring the delivery of mail to residences through the use of cluster mailboxes or curbside mailboxes unless the local government involved approves the use of such mailboxes. (Amends 39 U.S.C. 404).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit the Postal Service from requiring the delivery of mail to certain residences through the use of cluster mailboxes or curbside mailboxes unless local government involved approves the use of such mailboxes.
